basics.name: Marshall Johnston
basics.summary: Product leader with expertise in product management, technical leadership, and entrepreneurship. Proven track record in fundraising, market research, integrations, marketplaces and building AI-powered applications to scale businesses.

work.name: Caddie Software
work.summary: Leading product strategy and development for AI-powered applications.
highlights: Secured $3.5M+ in pre-seed and seed funding by delivering compelling market research and a strategic business plan.
Accepted into Y Combinatorâ€™s S22 cohort by showcasing an innovative solution to a prevalent sales operations challenge.
Launched 4 AI-powered applications, generating $360K+ in MRR with <5% monthly churn.
Developed an AI email client that aimed to boost deal velocity by 25% and reduced opportunity-to-win time by 20%.
Conducted 200+ user interviews and led iterative prototyping, improving customer retention and satisfaction.
Defined and executed a long-term product strategy, resulting in a 40% increase in customer acquisition over 12 months.

work.name: NinjaCat
work.summary: Led product development and strategic initiatives for technical products.
highlights: Led the roadmap, development, and launch of a no-code SQL builder, driving $16M of revenue each year and increasing non-technical user engagement by 100%.
Reduced data warehousing costs by $60K through a proprietary Snowflake management service.
Reduced churn by 10% by prioritizing business-critical integrations and maintaining 99.99% uptime.
Led a cross-functional team to bring a new product line to market, driving a 30% increase in revenue.

work.name: Good Weekend Co.
work.summary: Developed and scaled an award-winning travel booking platform with curated local experiences.
highlights: Pioneered and scaled an award-winning travel booking platform with curated local experiences.
Monetized the platform through partnerships and grew a loyal Instagram following of 25K+.
Launched a high-converting e-commerce platform, achieving 800+ bookings and 750+ merchandise sales.
Migrated to Webflow, improving site speed and enabling non-technical updates by team members.

work.name: FreshBooks
work.summary: Led integration efforts and contributed to significant ARR growth.
highlights: Managed P&L and deployed 5 key integrations, contributing $2.5M+ in ARR.
Subject Matter Expert on FreshBooks Payments (WePay), Stripe and PayPal integrations.
Increased mail integration profitability by 30% through strategic migrations and UX improvements.
Led the development of browser extensions and Postman collections, increasing API token generation by 18% YoY.

work.name: MUX Awards
work.summary: Established an annual UX design awards program.
highlights: Established an annual UX design awards program, generating revenue through submissions and partnerships.
Curated a judging panel including top industry leaders from Google, Airbnb, and Amazon.
Hosted an invite-only industry event for 100+ judges in the San Francisco Bay Area.
Received over 500 submissions from companies like Microsoft, Peloton, and Starbucks.
